text.section: There is a Maryland College Investment Plan.

The purpose of the Plan is to allow contributions to an investment account established for the purposes of meeting the qualified higher education expenses of the qualified designated beneficiary of the account.

section.section: The Board shall administer, manage, promote, and market the Plan.
The Board shall administer the Plan in compliance with Internal Revenue Service standards for qualified State tuition programs.

text.section: The Board shall adopt procedures that the Board considers necessary to carry out the provisions of this subtitle.
